subject: Order
description_text:
Hi, i ordered the simson plus x pedals from you guys on december 15th. I 
paid 40 dollars extra for express shipping but i have still not gotten 
any updates from the shipping. I need the pedals before christmas thats 
why i paid extra for express shipping.

When do you guys think im gonna get the package delivered and what can 
we do about the delay?

My order number is: #SSN4897

Best regards

Alfred Hållén

conversations.body_text: Hi Alfred,    We apologize for the delayed response. Your order was scheduled for shipment from our German warehouse, but due to shipping delays, the goods arrived later than expected. They arrived yesterday, and we have now shipped your order and updated your shipping notification.
